brand_identity.name: Jasubhai Chappal
brand_identity.target_audience: Women across India (Wedding, Festive, Daily wear)

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names

layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid for collections, clean 2-4 column grid for products
layout_strategies.mobile_first: Stack vertical on mobile, expand to grid on tablet+
layout_strategies.navigation: Sticky header with glassmorphism (warm cream tint), hamburger menu on mobile
layout_strategies.footer: Dark Maroon background with Gold text, spacious layout

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-[#600018] transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3

cards.product: group relative bg-white border border-border/40 hover:border-primary/20 transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden
cards.feature: bg-muted/50 p-8 text-center hover:bg-white transition-all duration-300 border border-transparent hover:border-border

components.inputs: bg-white border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all duration-200

animation_guidelines.hover_effects: scale-105 for images, text-underline-offset for links

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot
FONTS: Add Google Fonts link for 'Playfair Display', 'Mulish', and 'Great Vibes' in public/index.html
TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specified color palette and font families.
ICONS: Use Lucide React icons for all UI elements (ShoppingBag, Heart, Menu, X, ChevronDown, etc.).
IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do NOT use placeholders.
COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI logic but override styles to match the 'Royal/Handmade' aesthetic (rounded-none for crisp look where appropriate, but rounded-full for buttons).
LAYOUT: Ensure mobile responsiveness. The navigation must collapse into a hamburger menu on small screens.
CRITICAL: Do not use default blue/slate colors. Stick strictly to Maroon (#800020), Gold (#D4AF37), and Cream (#FDFBF7).
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast on the Cream background. Maroon text is readable, but Gold text needs a dark background (like the Footer).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use asymmetry in the Hero section.
Use 2-3x more spacing (padding) than typical designs.
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover, click).
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
